attributes.action: Restore Britain’s EU Membership for a Stronger Future
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to begin an open process exploring the UK rejoining the EU, including honest discussions with EU partners and clear information for the public. Many people feel global politics is becoming unstable, with rising uncertainty in the US, so the UK should strengthen its alliances. Rejoining the EU could support our economy, improve opportunities and give people a meaningful say in our future.
attributes.background: I want the UK Government to explore rejoining the EU to restore stability, protect our economy and strengthen alliances, especially as global politics feels increasingly unpredictable and the US becomes more volatile.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Apply to Rejoin the EU as soon as possible to increase growth in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749128
